{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00563v1", "title": "Dark matter as a vector field: an action principle for the Einstein
  cluster", "summary": "We show that a vector field non-minimally coupled to gravity reproduces the
dynamics of an Einstein cluster. Our results suggest a vectorial nature for
dark matter.", "main_category": "gr-qc", "categories": "gr-qc,astro-ph.CO,hep-ph", "published": "2025-05-01T14:40:23Z"}
